item.title: Screenwriting Storytelling Blueprint
item.description: Notes from the course ‘Screenwriting & Storytelling Blueprint: Hero’s Two Journeys’.

item.title: State of AI-assisted Software Development 2025 (DORA Report)
item.description: DORA’s 2025 research on AI’s impact on software development, revealing AI as an amplifier of organizational strengths and weaknesses.

item.title: Paper: A Note On Distributed Computing
item.description: A critique of the ‘unified view’ of local and distributed objects.

item.title: HBR: When It Comes to Influencers, Smaller Can Be Better
item.description: Research on the ROI of nano vs macro influencers.
